name: hipchat-bot
description: Server-side node module for parsing and resolving HipChat integration hooks. Easy to extend for custom Integrations and Chatbots.

scripts.test: NODE_ENV=test istanbul cover --report html node_modules/.bin/_mocha --recursive -- -R spec tests/**/*_spec.js

author: chrisdevwords <chrisdevwords@yahoo.com> (http://github.com/chrisdevwords/)
